title.narrative: Boosting Resilient and Inclusive Growth in The Bahamas

Potenciación del Crecimiento Resiliente e Inclusivo en las Bahamas

description.narrative: Promover crecimiento economico ambientalmente sostenible en las Bahamas a traves de: (i) promover diversificacion económica e innovación dentro de un marco de sostenibilidad ambiental; (ii) modernizar el clima de negocios y (iii) modernizar el marco institucional para crecimiento

The general objective of this operation is promoting competitiveness andenvironmental resiliency of The Commonwealth of The Bahamas. The specific objectives will be: (i) promotingMSMEs' business continuity and reducing administrative costs in the private sector for a more competitive businessclimate; and (ii) protecting natural resources, protecting the environment and promoting scientific developments inthe Blue Economy for better environmental resiliency.This project corresponds to the first of two operations under the modality of Programmatic Policy-Based Loan(PBP), to be contractually independent and technically related.
Commitment in third quarter of 2020
Disbursement in third quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2022
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2021
